text: UNC School of Medicine Charlotte Campus

Start it at Cabarrus College of Health Sciences! Healthcare jobs have never been in higher demand.  At Cabarrus College, you can become part of this high-demand, high-reward field more quickly than you may think.  Or, if you already work in healthcare, we can help you advance your career.  Offering programs you can finish in a year or less, to bachelor's and master's degrees, Cabarrus College has an option to fit your needs.
Join us at one of our

Cabarrus College offers immersive, experiential education in seven health science disciplines, with master’s, bachelor’s and associate degrees, plus diplomas, certificates and continuing education.  Small classes and a 6:1 student-to-faculty ratio ensure individualized instruction, with unmatched clinical experience that starts first semester and continues non-stop until graduation. What are you waiting for?  Check out our programs, NOW.

From your very first day, you’ll be immersed in a professional healthcare environment at our state-of-the-art facility on the campus of Atrium Health Cabarrus.  We’re part of one of the nation’s largest, most innovative healthcare systems, while still offering a small-college atmosphere and individualized instruction at an affordable price.  Our students boast 90  percent pass rates on licensure and certification, and 96 percent are working in healthcare within six months of graduation.

You’ll notice it the minute you step onto our campus.  There’s a culture here, a sense of community that is supportive, caring and welcoming.  From instructors who provide individualized instruction, to our Student Affairs team that supports you outside the classroom, everyone at Cabarrus College is invested in your success.  Our small-college atmosphere makes it easy to get to know your smart, motivated classmates and get involved.  Whether you’re interested in student government, community service or student professional clubs, there’s something for everyone.

Cabarrus College makes it easy for current students to stay connected - on campus, at home or on the go. Students can access Cabarrus College information anytime, as well as connect with instructors, classmates and staff members.
Our graduates are our greatest asset!  Prospective and current students look at your success and see what a Cabarrus College education can help them achieve.
Please stay in touch and help us educate the next generation of caring, exemplary healthcare professionals by giving back to Cabarrus College.

We are currently accepting applications for the spring 2020 semester. The priority deadline is October 1. Contact the Office of Admissions and Recruitment for more information at 704-403-1556 or email

Atrium Health complies with applicable Federal civil rights laws and does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, age, disability or sex.
